Harassment.  You need a...Even if this was true, you need a witness.  You need someone puts her in the car, and you've got nothing.  Now we all have...yes, give her that part in the film.  Yes, we'd love to have you...Now: we all have more important things to do, isn't that right...?

turns.text: Waal, then, you know, you do whatever would make you happy.  Sher.  This is your party, and whatever...

turns.text: Where the hell have you been...?  It's...

turns.text: Sherry, this...

turns.text: I am so glad to meet you.  We are so glad to <u>have</u> you here, and <u>welcome</u> you to our...I, you know, they had c...I'm, <u>yearly</u> I redecorate our, to restore it to the, 1835...

turns.text: And, my <u>wife</u> wanted to, wanted me to ask you, we'd like to <u>welcome</u> you, we'd, she'd like to have you to dinner at our house.  I don't mean to be...

turns.text: Yes, I hear it.

turns.text: Mmm...

turns.speaker: BEN
turns.text: Annabelle sucked her thumb last night.

turns.text: I NEVER do that, you ALWAYS lie!

turns.speaker: BEN
turns.text: I hate wax lips and red ants and pretzels without salt...

turns.text: "Those who travel far and near this will make you DISAPPEAR!"

turns.text: I have to work on my video project! Don't follow me!  I can put myself to bed.

turns.text: I killed her!

turns.text: Guinevere, Godiva, I sense enemy sol...

turns.text: Mommy's marrying Rache!

turns.text: I'd rather be with Mommy.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: ...it's really not so bad Annabelle -- Red and Blue make purple.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I don't care.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: I know you don't, but if you had, chrom- atically you <u>are</u> in the purple family.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: <u>Never</u> say 'never' -- it's <u>not</u> fair to say 'always' -- and <u>no</u> name calling. Use your words.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I hate when you say that.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Thank you.  Those were all words.  I hate the planet Uranus.  <u>Terrible</u> name for a planet.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I hate overly ripe bananas -- they make me want to throw up.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Excellent point.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I didn't say that.  Why would I say that?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Well Daddy and I were thinking that sometimes people tell a story about what they wish would happen.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I don't want that to happen.  Why would I want that to happen?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Well you're telling your teachers and your friends --

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Mass hysteria.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Maybe you're upset that Rachel moved in.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I'm not upset.  Why would I be upset?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Look if the truth is you don't feel like talking about this right now that's fine. But don't look me in the eye with a big smile on your face and lie to me. Cause there are only so many lies you're allowed to tell before it starts showing on your face.  You wind up looking like...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Like who?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Well, he's not president anymore, so why be petty.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: It just slipped out.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: It happens.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: What happens when he loves Rachel more than us?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: That will never happen.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Never say never you always say that. I'll bet daddy's mad at me now.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I'm gonna call him.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Annabelle, daddy and I will always be there. That's one time always is always.  You can call him after dinner but...

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Lord Nelson, Napoleon's troops.  I fear for the women and the property values.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I'll ride ahead.  Nelson, protect the Queen...

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Daddy was washing Rachel.  In the shower.  What did you think that was about?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Sex.  Of course.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Well, not exactly s...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Why does Rachel scream?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Scream.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: During sex.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: How would you know sh...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I live.  In the same country.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Oh God oh God Oh God oh God oh God Oh...

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: ...why do you think?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Because it feels really incredibly good.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: So why are you asking me?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I like talking about it.  At least, to you.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Because it's quiet.  And he wants to talk.  Alise -- Once he saws you in half, it's bedtime...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: What are you gonna talk about?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Probably you -- your brother -- school -- The solar system...The usual...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Then why are you putting on mascara?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: I'm a little tired and it's just a pick-me-up.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: But you only wore mascara when you and Daddy went on romantic dates...

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Well Daddy and I are just friends now, and that's no reason not to wear mascara...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Or blush.  You look pale.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Look she's upset --

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: No I'm not.  I don't care.  Why should I care?  I mean nobody asked me when you got divorced.  Nobody asked me if I wanted a new mother.  Nobody even asked me if I like her.  If you guys don't care about our family staying together, why sh...

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Daddy and I tried hard.  We really did.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: But we do have a choice.  To make it better.  Instead of worse.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Like how?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Like seeing the good side of Rachel. So she'll see the good side of us.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: That happens.  To families.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I'll be there for you.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Wow.  Who's that for?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Well.  It's for you.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: I hope it's the right kind.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Are you <u>kidding</u>?  It is <u>so</u> much better than the one Rachel showed me!

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: ...I mean, she knows all the music, and pop stars, and clothes and stuff. She's like still a kid, herself.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Like a big sister.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: She knows every neat junk food place.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Actually.  She's kind of cool, when you get to know her.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: I bet.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: And don't tell her I told you.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Secret's safe with me.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: I know how scared <u>I</u> get when <u>you're</u> sick.  So I waited to tell you.  Until it was getting smaller. I thought that was best, maybe I was wr...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: You lied.  If you lied <u>then</u>, maybe you're lying <u>now</u>.  I can <u>never</u> belive you <u>again</u>!

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: We make mistakes.  And we forgive each other.  Because we love each other, very m...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Where's Rache?  It's <u>Thursday</u>, we get to be with <u>Rache</u>!

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: I can't hear you.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: THEN TURN OFF THE CARTOON!

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I said...

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: ...I'm not deaf, y'know.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: He wouldn't know.  <u>I</u> saw her in the shower!

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: And...?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: She is only the <u>Princess</u> of Cool. <u>Mommy</u> is the Queen!

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: She is but an arriviste.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: What's Thursd...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: A debate.  Man's inhumanity to woman.  He's pro women.  I'm con. Ms. Flannery is twisted.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: I could help with the debate.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Actually.  I could only help him.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Every time I'm on the lunch yard, and he's with twelve of his retarded <u>dorkface</u> little adoring out-crowd <u>henchmen</u>...

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: You don't like his friends.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: ...they all yell 'There goes the Virgin Queen' or the 'Ice Princess', or some <u>really</u> clever cut like that. Like it hurts my feelings.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: You wouldn't kiss him, huh?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Not with my mouth open.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Good girl.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: And what do you do wh...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I call him a fartface or a pervert, or something equally lame.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: You have to ignore him.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: He's not even there.  You don't see him, you don't hear him, you're just too much of a woman to bother with little boys.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: This is a joke, right?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: This'll work, huh?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Oh, yeh.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: How many devilled eggs can you eat?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Maybe twenty.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Annabelle...wake up honey...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Mom?  What's wrong?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Nothing sweetheart.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Darling, I've been thinking about our little Brad problem?  And I think it's time we move to Plan B...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: You cannot <u>believe</u> what he said, it was the worst <u>instant</u> of my total life on <u>Earth</u>!!

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: I know.  I know how rough life can be. And how unfair.  So here's what we do. Tomorrow, on the lunch yard, you walk <u>straight</u> <u>up</u> to that little jerk...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: And bring my knees up, <u>real</u> hard, yeh?

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: No, that never solves anything.  You talk like the big girl you are.  About what you feel.  And how he's hurt you. You know?  You tell the truth.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I don't want to say goodbye.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Don't. Take me with you.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Thank God.  I got to see you. Grown up.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I'm not.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Let me be the judge of that.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Keep Ben's for awhile, okay?  Until he's old enough to not open them all at once.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Until he's old enough to read.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Are you afraid for me?  Where I'm going.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Don't be.  I'm going.  Where we all go.  Now how can that be bad.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I'll miss you so much.

turns.speaker: JACKIE
turns.text: Good.  That's very good.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: You forgot to wash my purple shirt.  I told you a hundred times it was Purple Day at school today.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: I didn't forget.  I was up all night thinking about it and I concluded you're too special to look like everyone else.  Orange Red.  That's your color.  Few can carry it off.  Now please.  Help me find your brother.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: You lost Ben?!

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Of course not.  Does he look lost to you?  BENNNNN!!!

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: No.  I told you.  I like apple butter not butter butter.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Here.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Never mind.  I'll just eat my lunch.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: I'm almost done making it.  Alright Ben -- <u>you</u> deal with the tardy, <u>you</u> write yourself a note, your daddy <u>told</u> you he had an important case this morning and he had to leave early and we were AAAAGGGGHHHH!

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I'm gonna beep daddy at work.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: He's badgering a witness.  Eat.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: You swore.  You owe me a quarter.  Did you remember my egg carton?  I told you I needed my egg carton for seed planting today.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Absolutely Duncan I'm on top of everything.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: I'm sorry, okay?  Let's not fi...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Don't touch me!  I'm <u>allergic</u> to you!

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I don't have to listen to you!  You're not my mother.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Thank God for that!

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: What I meant and perhaps I didn't say it well was you have a great mom.  You don't need another one.  But when you're at this house --

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: This is my daddy's house --

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: This is my house too!

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: And this is my room so get out!

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: The timing was off -- I need this light.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: <u>Just</u> where I wanna be all Saturd...

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Hold lunch!

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: But we're hungry -- and I have to pick up my costume for the pageant!  It starts at seven!

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: It's only one o'clock...Why don't you get another Fudgesicle -- I'll be done soon -- really soon.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Lunch time Sleeping Beauty.  Where's Ben?  Is he in the bathroom?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I don't know...I feel like I'm gonna throw up.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: What if he's kidnapped?

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: He's not kidnapped he's -- he's just hiding -- he's just -- BENNNN?  GODDAMMIT!

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: C'mon, these are the Bomb, I prom...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Now could she just...<u>forget</u> me!

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Your mom had to...help a friend with this...emergency?  And she called me. And we switched days.  Then, I got stuck on my shoot, and...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: MOMMY!

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: It's not to wear around, or any- thing, I'm <u>way</u> too young.  It's just for play.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: See, I...

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: She still packing for her trip?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: I <u>killed</u> my math quiz, A-minus.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: You know what that creep and his frogfaced footmen are calling me <u>now</u>?  In front of the whole <u>world</u>? Frosty, the Snow Bitch!!

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: That's so weak.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Here's <u>weak</u>...Mom said she was gonna talk to the <u>teacher</u> and Brad's <u>parents</u>!!  Can you <u>believe</u> the <u>humiliation</u>???

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Honey, she won't d...

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Annabelle, I know you miss your mother.  So why don't you say hello.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Why don't you say hello?

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: Annabelle pick up the phone.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Annabelle pick up the phone.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: That doesn't bother me.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: That doesn't bother me.

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: You think this is funny?

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: You think this is funny?

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: No.  I think it's ugly.

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: You're just a <u>stepmother</u>.  So stop <u>bossing</u>, cos nobody's <u>listening</u>!

turns.speaker: RACHEL
turns.text: June 3rd, God willing, I'll marry your Dad.  And then I <u>will</u> be your stepmom. And right now, I'm not looking forward to th...

turns.speaker: ANNABELLE
turns.text: Suits me <u>fine</u>!
